description: A flat paper container with a sealable flap, used to enclose a letter or other paper goods.
A written message from one person to another, usually put in an envelope.  Reading it would be rude.

variants.description: A written message from a soldier to their partner, carefully folded into its envelope.  Their deployment ends soon and they can't wait to see their lover.  Reading the rest of it would be rude.

A written message from a soldier to their partner, stuffed angrily into its envelope.  They know, they know she knows, and don't even pretend you don't know.  This letter is full of expletives you don't dare read aloud.
A written message from a soldier to their parents.  Their deployment has been extended and they won't be home for the holidays.  This sad letter makes you feel homesick.
A written message from a woman to her lover, it's sealed with a heart-shaped sticker and smells of perfume.  You start to read it but it quickly becomes embarrassing.

A written message from a student to their parents scrawled on notebook paper.  They're having a really bad time at college and want to come home, nothing seems to be going well, their grades and heart are in the dumps.

A written message from a student to their parents scrawled on notebook paper.  They're having a great time at college and can't wait to introduce you to their new lover.  Coincidently they have run out of money for gas again and it sure would be great if you could send some.
A written message home in a foreign tongue, carefully folded into its envelope.
A folded pink sheet of paper declaring the homeowner fired!  Oh no.
A notification from a credit card company, the recipient has been preapproved!  Attached in a thick wad of glue is a fake credit card, this could be theirs if they wanted it.
A letter from the bank stating the homeowners account is overdrawn and they owe quite a bit of money.
A letter to recipient notifying them of their overdue rent, they have 30 days to pay or they are going to court!
A notice from the local police, there is a tiny picture of a car and a demand of 350 dollars for speeding in a school zone.

description: A piece of thick, rectangular paper intended for writing and mailing without an envelope.
A small card that can be exchanged for goods or services from a particular business, usually given as a gift.

variants.description: A gift card for a local restaurant, covering the cost for an entire meal.
A $20 gift card, redeemable for purchases at your local clothing store.
This gift card could be exchanged for a free cut at a local barbershop.
A $100 electronic gift card, redeemable for purchases at your local megastore.
This gift card gives you a 5% discount for purchases at your local shopping mall.  Can only be redeemed once.
A $5 gift card, redeemable for purchases at your local bookstore.
A $10 gift card, redeemable for purchases at your local hardware store.

description: A piece of card stock meant to convey an expression of sentiment.

variants.description: A greeting card for expressing best wishes.  Its corners are decorated with paintings of flowers and leaves.
A baby blue greeting card with a drawing of a teddy bear holding an umbrella.  Words printed on it read: "It's getting closer by the hour, so let's have a baby shower!"
A greeting card given to a person to celebrate their birthday.  This one has a floral design.
This greeting card displays a picture of a graduate tossing their graduation cap.  Above the cap is the word 'CONGRATULATIONS'.
A white greeting card with a stylized drawing of an empty road.  Words printed on it read: "You're going places (literally).  Wishing you the best!"
A greeting card with a stylized picture of a donut and a coffee cup.  Above the picture, it says 'I am thankful for our friendship' and below are the words 'we are better together'.
This greeting card displays a cartoon turtle in a cozy blanket sipping hot tea.  Above the turtle, it says 'Wishing you a SPEEDY recovery!'
A greeting card wishing the recipient a long and happy retirement.  This one displays a drawing of a rocking chair surrounded with white roses.
A black greeting card with a picture of a dimly lit candle.  Words printed on it read: "Please accept our deepest and most heartfelt condolences at this challenging time."
A plain white greeting card featuring an expression of gratitude to the recipient.
